help_text:
Sancho Help

General message: AI chat (LLM response)
Search/browser keyword included: Browser agent runs

Commands:
/clear - Clear conversation history
/status - Browser agent status
/help - This help
no_model: No available model. Please configure API keys and models in Settings.
model_unavailable: Model '{model}' is unavailable. Please check your API key.
processing_error: Sorry, an error occurred during processing.
rate_limit: API rate limit exceeded. Please try again shortly.
browser_running: Browser agent is already running. Please try again after it finishes.
